longDistanceDates.description: Watch the same movie together while on a video call.
Cook the same meal and eat together over a video call.
Explore an online museum tour together.
Read the same book and discuss it over a video call.

freeDates.description: Find a quiet spot and watch the stars.
Explore a local trail or nature reserve.
Pack a simple picnic and enjoy it at a nearby park.
Spend a day at the beach building sandcastles and swimming.
Watch your favorite movies at home.

datesToDressUpFor.description: Dress up and go out for a fancy dinner.
Attend a performance at an opera house or ballet theater.
Participate in a local gala or charity event.
Dress up and enjoy a night out at a cocktail bar.
Go to a formal dance or ball.

lateNightDates.description: Go out for a late-night snack or dessert.
Explore the city at night and enjoy the lights.
Catch a live music performance at a local venue.
Go for a hike under the stars or by the light of the moon.
Take a drive to a scenic spot and enjoy the night view.

daytimeDates.description: Enjoy a leisurely brunch at a nice caf√©.
Spend the day exploring a museum.
Visit a local botanical garden and enjoy the flowers.
Spend the day at the zoo or aquarium.
Take a cooking class together and learn to make a new dish.
